text: Robertson speaking at the 2014 Aro Valley candidates meeting This is a summary of the electoral history of Grant Robertson, Deputy Leader of the New Zealand Labour Party (2011–13), Minister of Finance (2017–) and Member of Parliament for (2008–). ==Parliamentary elections== ===2008 election=== ===2011 election=== Electorate (as at 26 November 2011): 48,316 ===2014 election=== ===2017 election=== ==Labour party leadership elections== ===2013 leadership election=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !scope="col" rowspan="2"|Candidate !scope="col" colspan="2"|Caucus (40%) !scope="col" colspan="2"|Members (40%) !scope="col" rowspan="2"|Unions (20%) !scope="col" rowspan="2"|Total (%) |- !scope="col"|Votes !scope="col"|% !scope="col"|Votes !scope="col"|% |- ! scope="row" align="left"| | align="right"|11 | align="right"| 32.35 | align="right"|3,243 | align="right"| 60.14 | align="right"| 70.77 | align="right"| 51.15 |- ! scope="row" align="left"| | align="right"|16 | align="right"| 47.06 | align="right"|1,440 | align="right"| 26.71 | align="right"| 17.30 | align="right"| 32.97 |- ! scope="row" align="left"| | align="right"|7 | align="right"| 20.59 | align="right"|709 | align="right"| 13.15 | align="right"| 11.92 | align="right"| 15.88 |- !scope="row"|Total | align="right"|34 | align="right"|100 | align="right"|5,392 | align="right"|100 | align="right"|100 | align="right"|100 |}Source: ===2014 leadership election=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Labour leadership election results !Section (% weighting) !
